data:
Abun: gap sye bi gan
English: big rat's offspring

Abun: ji bi ngwe
English: my garden

Abun: ji syim
English: my arm

Abun: ndar sye gwes
English: big dog's leg

Abun: gap bi ngwe
English: rat's garden

problems.name: Ainu
data:
Ainu: Numan hambaga ku=e.
English:Yesterday I ate a hamburger.

Ainu: Ku=kor acapo pirka nispa ne.
English:My uncle is a good chief.

Ainu: Husko cise e=kor.
English:You have an old house.

Ainu: E=pake sonno poro.
English:Your head is very big.

Ainu: Ukran ku=kor hapo kimunkamuy nukar.
English:Last night my mother saw a bear.

Ainu: Tan pone e=oterke.
English:You step on this bone.

Ainu: Ku=cikir tanne.
English:My leg is long.

Ainu: Sita ermun kuykuy.
English:The dog bites a mouse.

Ainu: Wakka wa cep terke.
English:The fish jumps from the water.

Ainu: Hoska=numan Nupurpet en ku=oowet.
English:Two days ago I returned to Noboribetsu.
questions: Ainu: Tan kimunkamuy poro cep e.
English: The mouse that I saw ate a big hamburger.
English: The old dog has a good head.
English: The big bear is a mother.
English: Two days ago my uncle returned from the water to the old house.
answers: English: This bear ate a big fish.
English: Your mother is very old.
English: Last night the kangaroo bit my leg.
English: The bone that you bit is very old.
Ainu: Ku=nukar ermun poro hambaga e.
Ainu: Husko sita pirka pake kor.
Ainu: Hoska=numan wakka wa husko cise en ku=kor acapo oowet.

problems.name: Ayutla Mixe
data:
Mixe: Ëjts nexp.
English: I see.

Mixe: Mejts mtunp.
English: You work.

Mixe: Juan yë'ë yexyejtpy. 
English: Juan watches him.

Mixe: Yë'ë yë' uk yexpy.
English: He sees the dog.

Mixe: Ëjts yë' maxu'unk nexyejtpy.
English: I watch the baby.
questions: English: The baby watches the dog.
answers: Seri: Yë' maxu'unk yë' uk yexpy.

problems.name: Chimalapa Zoque
data:
Chimalapa Zoque: ʔokmaŋpa haʔčukkə
English:They are beginning to go into debt.

Chimalapa Zoque: cəkhae ʔum ʔiššə
English: Don't see the witchcraft.

Chimalapa Zoque: šiššəm poŋpa
English: You are burning the meat.

Chimalapa Zoque: nə yay močukkə
English: They didn't mix the water.

Chimalapa Zoque: pən minpay šemhayyám yomáʔ
English: The man is coming to play (music) for the woman now.

Chimalapa Zoque: ya mi yakhacə
English: He/she is not making you go into debt.

Chimalapa Zoque: ʔokmawə də wittammám
English: Let's begin to walk now.

Chimalapa Zoque: hopowe ʔun cəktammə
English: Let's not make the fire.

Chimalapa Zoque: yomá təʔʔoyyə
English: The woman wanted.

Chimalapa Zoque: nəkkən hoʔištame totoʔ
English: I went to examine the book.

Chimalapa Zoque: ʔəm ʔectampa
English: You all are dancing.

Chimalapa Zoque: nə yan hea
English: I am not stirring the water..

Chimalapa Zoque: huki šiŋpám
English: The cigarette is swelling now.

Chimalapa Zoque: yədəm motaʔ
English: Mix this.

Chimalapa Zoque: nəm hoʔukəʔ
English: Drink all of the water (to the last drop).

Chimalapa Zoque: šiš puʔccəmmə
English: The meat was rotted.

Chimalapa Zoque: də yakkəššodammə
English: He/she fed us.

Chimalapa Zoque: minnəy heyšuki šiš
English: They came to stir the meat.
questions: English: The musician is eating now.
English: The book is being burned.
English: We are going to want the water.
answers: English: You all are beginning to burn.
English: They are going to eat the meat.
English: He/she is making him/her see.
English: You didn't walk for him/her.

problems.name: Seri
data:

English: the tall man

English: the short woman

questions: Seri: ziix hapx coom imáacoj quih

problems.name: Seri 2
data:
Seri: tom quij
English: the money

Seri: Trooqui quij mazíim.
English: The truck is beautiful.

Seri: Canóaa com haaco cop ano quiij iha.
English: The canoe is inside the house.

Seri: Simet quij trooqui cop ano quiij iha.
English: The bread is inside the truck.

Seri: Canóaa com quihízlc iha.
English: The canoe is dirty.

Seri: Cmiique quih canóaa cop ano quiij iha.
English: The person is inside the canoe.
questions: English: The money is in the canoe.
English: The person ate the bread (the bread is inside the person).
answers: Seri: Tom quij canóoa cop ano quij iha.
Seri: Simet quij cmiique cop ano quiij iha.
